fact_check_explanation_title: No, the ‘P’ on your passport does not stand for ‘peasant’
fact_check_explanation_summary: A Facebook post falsely claims that the capital ‘P’ which appears on passports under “type” stands for “peasants”.

fact_check_explanation_title: Daily Mail report on GPs seeing fewer patients on Fridays needs more context
fact_check_explanation_summary: There are some important caveats to figures showing GP appointments drop off later in the week.
The Royal Society found that 3.5% of black academic staff working in STEM were professors, not that 3.5% of professors were black.

fact_check_explanation_title: Thousands of sea turtles did not hatch on Indian beach this week
fact_check_explanation_summary: A Facebook post falsely suggests that hundreds of thousands of sea turtles hatched at a beach in India.

fact_check_explanation_title: No evidence New South Wales Premier resigned over bribes from Pfizer or AstraZeneca
fact_check_explanation_summary: While Australian politician Gladys Berejiklian has resigned recently it has nothing to do with vaccinations.

fact_check_explanation_title: mRNA vaccines aren’t gene editing and don’t alter your DNA
fact_check_explanation_summary: A video claiming vaccines are part of the ‘fourth industrial revolution’ uses footage of World Economic Forum founder Klaus Schwab to claim vaccines edit your genes.

fact_check_explanation_title: You can still park on the pavement in Wales
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Welsh government is planning to give councils more power to fine problem parkers from July next year, but doesn’t plan to pursue an outright ban.

fact_check_explanation_title: Teen deaths up since last year, but no evidence vaccines responsible
fact_check_explanation_summary: 2020 saw lower than average teen deaths due to various factors, and so isn’t a “normal” year to compare 2021 against.

fact_check_explanation_title: What do we know about the AstraZeneca vaccine in pregnancy?
fact_check_explanation_summary: We’ve answered some of your most frequently asked questions.

fact_check_explanation_title: Most police have not been found guilty of sexual misconduct
fact_check_explanation_summary: This claim comes from confusion over another statistic, about the proportion of those in one force found to have committed sexual misconduct who kept their jobs.

fact_check_explanation_title: Boris Johnson claim about HGV driver visas sparks confusion
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Prime Minister told a BBC journalist that 127 HGV drivers had applied for short-term visas. But the government’s bizarrely refused to explain how that figure is calculated.

fact_check_explanation_title: Falling crime is related to pandemic lockdowns
fact_check_explanation_summary: Boris Johnson said falls in police recorded crime are ‘not just’ because of lockdowns.
